of dimension 100.GloVe (Pennington et al., 2014): used to initialize word vectors for all three datasets

Pre-trained embeddings.from sentence: Pre-trained embeddings GloVe (Pennington et al., 2014) of dimension 100 are used to initialize the word vectors for all three datasets.

embeddings of POS tags.from sentence: The embeddings of POS tags are initialized randomly with dimension 32.

trained using.from sentence: The model is trained using Adam (Kingma and Ba, 2014) and a gradient clipping of 3.0.
